entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Bouctouche
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:03 PM AST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Bouctouche
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:01 PM AST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kouchibouguac 12:00 AM AST Monday 16 January 2023
Temperature: -1.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.2 kPa falling
Humidity: 97 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -2.1°C
Wind: NNE 22 km/h gust 36 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Ice pellets or snow. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow early this evening. Snow mixed with ice pellets beginning early this evening then changing to ice pellets mixed with freezing rain near midnight. Risk of freezing drizzle early this evening. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along the Strait overnight. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Freezing rain mixed with rain. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Freezing rain mixed with rain changing to rain near noon. Fog patches developing late in the afternoon. Rainfall amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along the Strait. High plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Rain. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Rain ending near midnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers or drizzle. Fog patches. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 15 January 2023
